casebody.data:
(April 11, 1957)

(Republished)

Ruth Borax, Appellant, v. Herman Borax, Respondent.

Order, so far as appealed from, unanimously affirmed without costs, and the order entered April 9, 1957, vacated. Opinion Per Curiam. Concur — Breitel, J. P., Botein, Rabin, Valente and McNally, JJ. [See ante, p. 404.]
